title: What isAmazon Elastic Beanstalk?

metadata.description: Learn about What isAmazon Elastic Beanstalk? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk is an orchestration service.
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk Introduction Video
.com is collaborating with Amazon Web Services to deliver digital training content to our students
What is Amazon Elastic Beanstalk?
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk is a web infrastructure management service. It handles deployment and scaling for web applications and services.
Elastic Beanstalk can automatically manage setup, configuration, scaling and provisioning for other AWS services.
AWS services that can be automatically manage include
Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud)
,
Amazon S3 (Simple Storage Service)
,
AWS RDS (Relational Database Service)
,
Amazon DynamoDB
, and Amazon SimpleDB.
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk supported platforms
Docker
Go
Java SE
Java with Tomcat
.NET
Node.js
PHP
Python
Ruby
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk Pricing
Amazon Elastic Beanstalk is priced by AWS resources used.

★
+1
